name: Gopal Krushna Sahoo
about: As a passionate Flutter developer, my career objective is to leverage my expertise in mobile app development to create innovative and seamless cross-platform applications. I aspire to contribute to dynamic teams and projects, applying my in-depth knowledge of Flutter, Dart, and UI/UX design principles. With a commitment to staying abreast of emerging trends in mobile development, I aim to deliver cutting-edge solutions that not only meet but exceed user expectations. My goal is to collaborate with forward-thinking organizations where I can contribute my problem-solving skills and creativity to enhance user experiences. By continuously refining my skills and embracing new technologies, I aim to be a valuable asset in building robust and scalable mobile applications. Ultimately, my career objective is to be a proficient Flutter developer recognized for delivering high-quality, user-centric applications that make a positive impact in the digital landscape.

education.degree: Master Of Science In Information Security
education.desc: Pursuing MSc in Information Security, my education encompasses advanced studies in cybersecurity, cryptography, and risk management. Focused on developing a comprehensive understanding of securing digital assets, I explore topics such as network security, ethical hacking, and secure software development. With a commitment to staying abreast of evolving threats and protective measures, I aim to contribute effectively to the field of information security, ensuring robust defenses against cyber threats.
1200 + Hour Coding, 100 +Hour of Soft skill Development, Data Structures And algorithms, Collaborative projects, and Teamwork, 100 + Mini Projects, 5 + Major Projects.

To gain insight into the importance of cyber security and the integral role of cyber security professionals to develop a high level of professional ethics. To explore foundational cyber security principles, security architecture, attacks, incidents, and emerging IT Security Technologies. To be familiar with key terms and concepts in cyber law, Security Standards, intellectual property rights and Acts on IT Security. To be able to understand principles of web application security and network security.

Mainly studied the process and method of e-commerce, familiar with the mainstream e-commerce platform and tools. The objective is to learn and get engaged in corporate branding and product promotion, customer resource development and skill, cross-border e-commerce operation, network marketing, mobile commerce management, etc.
In the Intermediate Science course studied Zoology, Botany (animal life, plant life, weather, water, etc), physics, chemistry, and Mathematics as well as technology and astronomy.

experience.desc: As a Software Developer, I design, develop, and maintain software applications. I collaborate with teams, gather requirements, and implement solutions using programming languages and frameworks. I ensure code quality, perform testing, and debug issues. Effective communication, continuous learning, and documentation are integral parts of my work.

I ensure code quality, perform testing, and debug issues. Effective communication, continuous learning, and documentation are integral parts of my work.
